node.html:
• Coordinated a team of 9 to automate volunteer management tasks for Ground-Up Initiative, a sustainability NGO with 25000+ volunteers
  • Led the development of a Next.js frontend app to manage volunteer signups, event scheduling, and attendance tracking

• RepoSense: Git contribution analysis tool
    Maintaining the project as senior developer.
    Included merge commits in the report, color-coded authors in code diffs, and pinned the file title for better UX while scrolling.

  • date-fns: modern JavaScript date utility library
    Added support for function aliases and working on improving Duration support for the library.

  • matplotlib: plotting with Python
    Created a new ellipse annotation style for plots, and updated relevant tests and release documentation for version 3.7.

• Software Engineering (CS2103T): Conducting weekly tutorials and guiding 40 students in core software engineering practices

  • Interaction Design (CS3240): Revamped the course curriculum to include AI in the design process and designing for AI-powered apps.
    Mentored 3 teams in their design projects and conducted a Figma workshop for 70 students.

  • Orbital Advisor: Mentored 5 teams in their mobile app development projects; 1 of my teams was given an Honourable Mention for their innovative music transcription app

• Initiated and executed the StartTank program to guide 15 teams in building their first technology start-up
  • Led 2 teams of 20 students to organise biweekly tech workshops, hackathons, and networking events to promote personal vision for the club â€“ "Taking actions towards goals"
• Mentored 2 primary school students by introducing them to coding and AI with project-based learning on Scratch and Teachable Machine
